actions.name: Check the best game
actions.description: Compares the game number 1 on twitch to the game chosen by the user, and return true if it is the same, otherwise false.

actions.name: Streamer by username
actions.description: Checks if the streamer selects and live, if yes return true, otherwise false.

actions.name: Check the number of viewers
actions.description: Check if the chosen streamer has more than **SELECTED NUMBER** viewers, if yes return true, otherwise false.
